title: Stainless Steel Appliances Package*, Smoke Free Community*

posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 40', 'OR Text', '40', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1200 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Talavera’s modern apartments are designed and outfitted for a fulfilling Spring Valley lifestyle, with each pet-friendly one-, two-, and three-bedroom spacious home interior finished to create a contemporary aesthetic.', 'Our community features include a comfortable resident lounge, a billiards room, resort-style pool/spa areas, and onsite conveniences all overseen by an attentive onsite management team.', 'Call for additional amenity and leasing details or to book your personal tour.', 'RENOS - COMING SOON!', 'Features:', 'Expansive Nine-Foot Ceilings, Inviting Gas Log Fireplaces*, Air Conditioning & Central Heat, Full-Size Washer and Dryer, Private Decks with Enclosed Storage, Stainless Steel Appliances Package*, Ceiling Fans*, Available Garages with Remote Access, Linen Closet, Spacious Pantries, Wired for Technology, Walk-in Closets, New LED Lighting Package, Wood Plank Flooring Throughout Unit*, Vaulted Ceilings on Top Floor Homes, WiFi ready', '*In Select Units', 'Community Amenities:', 'On-Site Management and Maintenance, Newly Renovated Fitness Center Open 24/7, Resident WIFI Lounge, Automated Package Locker System, Near Highway US95 and 215, We Love Pets!*, Easy Access to the Strip and Major Employment Venues, Smoke Free Community*, Direct Private Access to green belt, Controlled Access Entry*, Resident Lounge/Game area, Assigned Parking, Convenient Access to Abundant Shopping, Neighborhood Amenities and Schools, Deposit Alternative Options Available, Newly Modernized Resort-Inspired Pools and Spas, Barbecue Grills and Picnic Areas Throughout, Green Globe Certified', '*Restrictions Apply.', 'See Sales Associate For Details.', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'One-time pet fee: $400', 'Pet monthly rent min: $35 (per pet)', 'Pet policy: Breed restrictions apply.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'aPWWS1GvkI']
